zh-cn.title: 一对一私教（提高听力技能和美国英语发音）

faqs.question: Who are your private lessons for? 私教课为谁而设？
answer: They are for anyone who wants to level up their listening skills and be able to understand real-life fast conversations.
译：我的私教课程适合想要提高听力并能够听懂生活快速英语的学生。

faqs.question: How much does your course cost? 你的课程费用是多少?
How long is each lesson? 一节课时长？
Will I be given homework? 课后会留作业吗？
answer: Yes, students will be given dictation exercises as homework.
译：是的。我会给您布置听力作业。

faqs.question: How is the lesson conducted? 课程如何进行？
How do I schedule my lessons? 如何预约课程？
answer: To schedule your lessons, please leave a message in the 'Contact' section of my website.
译：请在我的网站“联系”部分留言以安排您的课程时间。

zh-tw.title: 一對一私教（提高聽力技能和美國英語發音）

faqs.question: Who are your private lessons for? 私教課為誰而設？
answer: They are for anyone who wants to level up their listening skills and be able to understand real-life fast conversations.
譯：我的私教課程適合想要提高聽力並能夠聽懂生活快速英語的學生。

faqs.question: How much does your course cost? 你的課程費用是多少?
How long is each lesson? 一節課時長？
Will I be given homework? 課後會留作業嗎？
answer: Yes, students will be given dictation exercises as homework.
譯：是的。我會給您布置聽力作業。

faqs.question: How is the lesson conducted? 課程如何進行？
How do I schedule my lessons? 如何預約課程？
answer: To schedule your lessons, please leave a message in the 'Contact' section of my website.
譯：請在我的網站「聯系」部分留言以安排您的課程時間。
